detail_desc: Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede flap with a compartment and decoration on the front and magnetic fastener. Narrow shoulder strap at the top and card compartments inside. Lined. Size approx. 5x11x17 cm.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with adjustable straps that fasten at the front, a chest pocket with an embroidered motif, concealed press-studs at the crotch and ribbing at the hems.

Joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, contrasting colour panels down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft cotton jersey lining containing some viscose.
Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Set with a wrapover bodysuit and pair of trousers in a soft organic cotton blend. Jersey bodysuit with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch. Velour trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a dungaree dress and long-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with adjustable straps that fasten at the front, a print motif at the top and a seam that is gathered at the front and elasticated at the back of the waist. Bodysuit with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with press-studs, a zip down the front and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. One chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.

Parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the waist. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, two inner pockets and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. Detachable, quilted inner lining with a ribbed stand-up collar. Polyester filling.
